scripts.changelog: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s -r 0 && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm run changelog && git push && git push --tags
scripts.minor: npm version minor -m "Upgrade to %s" && git push && git push --tags
scripts.major: npm version major -m "Upgrade to %s" && git push && git push --tags
